EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-08-10
EmailTemplate.subject: How DISH Learned Agile Development Methods to Quickly Launch New Applications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
august 10, 2017 <[[https://pivotal.io/imapivot/dish?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How DISH Learned Agile Development Methods To Quickly Launch New Applications Find out how DISH fully engaged agile development and created a culture of innovation. Their Story <[[https://pivotal.io/imapivot/dish?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/that-moment-episode-3-the-mother-of-all-projects-ff33eb59feb6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> That Moment, Episode 3: “The Mother of All Projects” How did opting out of a high school class change the course of a Fortune 500 company? How did an accident lead a race car driver into entrepreneurship? Find out about these moments and more on Episode 3 of That Moment. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://builttoadapt.io/that-moment-episode-3-the-mother-of-all-projects-ff33eb59feb6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2017-08-09/pentagon-s-silicon-valley-unit-tweaks-software-to-hit-terrorists]]> Pentagon's Silicon Valley Unit Helps Target Terrorists Check out how Pivotal is helping the military streamline their software. Learn More <[[https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2017-08-09/pentagon-s-silicon-valley-unit-tweaks-software-to-hit-terrorists]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/3-answers-and-a-question-with-susan-j-fowler-477fcc6b7ffd?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Three Answers and A Question with Susan J. Fowler Susan J. Fowler, Editor-in-Chief of Increment Magazine joins us for our Twitter Q&A session 3 Answers and A Question. Check it Out <[[https://builttoadapt.io/3-answers-and-a-question-with-susan-j-fowler-477fcc6b7ffd?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/data-science-reveals-extraordinary-insights-into-drivers-and-their-behavior?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Data Science Reveals Extraordinary Insights Into Drivers and Their Behavior Swati Soni breaks down a successful, enablement-focused engagement with a global automobile manufacturer on the Pivotal blog. Read Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/data-science-reveals-extraordinary-insights-into-drivers-and-their-behavior?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/arts-crafts-and-app-modernization?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Arts, Crafts, and App Modernization In this episode of Pivotal Insights, Shaun Anderson chats with Jeff and Dormain about his experience leading Pivotal's application modernization practice, shares advice on how enterprises can choose which applications are the best candidates for modernization, and discusses the human element in application modernization. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/arts-crafts-and-app-modernization?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-whiteboard-sessions-introducing-a-new-tech-paper-series?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Whiteboard Sessions: Introducing a New Tech Paper Series We're sharing the patterns and practices we’ve helped craft and implement at enterprises around the world in our new tech paper series. Find Out More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-whiteboard-sessions-introducing-a-new-tech-paper-series?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 8/11 Cloud-Native Roadshow, San Francisco <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/san-francisco/]]>
8/15 Analytics Innovation Roadshow, Atlanta <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/atlanta]]>
8/16 .NET Cloud-Native Bootcamp, Irvine <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/dotNET-Cloud-Native-Bootcamp-Irvine.html]]>
8/23 Cloud-Native Roadshow, Seoul <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/seoul]]>
8/25 Cloud-Native Roadshow, Tokyo <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/tokyo]]>
